extendedInfo.description: Fallen asleep with the TV on? Great dreams but woken by ads? Dreamshuffle â Same concept â But controlled. Our specially recorded scenes are mixed to make thousands of dreams. Played quietly to influence you but not to wake you. Adventure, mystery, tranquility. All are present in our free app. Extra dream packs are available in the market right now.Don't just interpret your dreams. Take control of your dreaming and live them. Get lucid. Get Dreamshuffle.

reviews.comment: This app let\'s you set all your dream preferences & scenarios then completely freezes at the phase where you should start to dream. Force close.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good For Free App
reviews.comment: I believe it helps me dream, but it could be the power of suggestion. What lets it down is an inability to turn off the talking, and a lack of any (so far as I\'m aware) erotic content which is inplied in the options sceen. The nature sounds are great, but I found the drama ones woke me up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing...
reviews.comment: Last night I had the best dream ive ever had... So good that I only woke up at 2pm... I wanna go back to sleep!
reviews.author: Vee Misty

reviews.comment: I\'m a Marine vet with bad ptsd. This app has helped greatly for me not to have nightmares from over there. Thank you very much! Oohrah
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works pretty great for me, no problems whatsoever yet. It would be nice to be able to chose your dream number and set kindof a dream playlist :]
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works...
reviews.comment: This app works...i luv it its amazing...<3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Spot on!!! Cant wait to go to bed at night! ....better than sex idk, but its close!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: It helps me dream everytime I sleep
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its amazing how our mind reacts to all those words buzzing in our head during sleep... Pretty impressive app.. Please add more scenarios..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not what I expected and I sure didn\'t get the results the app describes. Random recordings of random stuff didn\'t help you. uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Thanks to this App developer

reviews.title: Good app

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Would have liked to see more content though...wtf happened to the dev?

reviews.comment: Shuts off when display shuts off . Galaxy note 2 . Back to sleeping with the tv on
reviews.author: david hollman

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Needs more scenarios.

reviews.title: Nick
reviews.comment: First night I used this app and had a wet dream. I totally recommend it!

reviews.comment: It works for me. Woke me up a few times at first whilst getting the volume right. Having very vivid dreams and the themes are coming through. Clever!

reviews.comment: Hmm. I dont seem to be recieving influence. Actually Ill just download some binaural beats.
